questions.question: Which method is used to sort a list in ascending order in Python?
What is the difference between a list and a tuple in Python?
choices: Tuples are mutable; lists are not
Lists are mutable; tuples are not
Tuples consume more memory than lists
questions.answer: Lists are mutable; tuples are not
